title: CS Competency Practical Enhancement: Facebook-Based Mathematics Theory Application and Practical Skills Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and professional field (medical/legal/technical) practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more real-world applications of mathematical theories through Facebook group discussions.
Learners can share and improve mathematical problem-solving strategies at least twice based on peer feedback.
Learners achieve 80% or higher response accuracy on theory-practice integration questions in offline classes after Facebook group activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
